2025-08-01.activity:
Be at Wesley’s house at 5:00 am – everyone but Graham (445 Belmont Road)
Jacob takes Carson & Nick (coordinate on your own).
Ethan & Tyler drive separately.

Wesley packs & everyone hangs out, load up cars.
Tyler’s car: Wesley, Carson, Greg
Jacob’s car: Ethan, Nick

Waffle House in Arlington by 7:00 (11636 U.S. 70, Arlington, TN)
Stay in same cars.

Chickfila stop at Meridian, MS (109 S. Frontage Rd., Meridian, MS 39301)
SWITCH CARS:
Tyler’s car: Wesley, Ethan
Jacob’s car: Nick, Carson, Greg
Communicate with Graham about arrival time changes.

NO EARLIER than 3:30!! Every car arrives at Publix (25771 Perdido Beach Blvd, Orange Beach, AL 36561)
Graham leaves car there.

Condo setup team (Tyler, Graham, Carson, Greg) prepares the space.
At Publix around 5:00, buy: eggs, bacon, biscuits, butter, chips, cheese dip, salsa, chicken fries, loaf of bread, Oscar Meyer deli ham, Oscar Meyer deli turkey, cheese slices, bag of ice.
Michelob Ultra, Coke Zero, Jack Daniels – Tyler bringing from home.

Wesley & car (Ethan, Wesley, Jacob, Nick) head to condo — keep Wesley busy before arrival.
Ideas: Souvenir shop, Walmart, Dollar General...

Wesley’s car arrives.
Call Tyler to bring down parking pass.
Order pizza from Pizza Hut.
Pizza, beer, video games, paper airplanes.
DON’T TELL WESLEY ANY OF THIS. ITINERARY IS A SECRET EVEN AFTER ARRIVAL.

2025-08-02.activity: Up to condo to start getting ready for dinner with quick showers.
